name: Rural Rajasthan on Bicycle
description:
This tour is the best tour to experience and explore the timeless and mystique magnificence of Rajasthan. While cycling through the golden sands, rustic villages and the other parts of Rajasthan, the riders will get to know about the royal history of Rajasthan and its grandeurs.

The tour itinerary has been designed in a way, the cyclists will get to ride through most of the important places in Rajasthan and witness their beauty and splendour. Adequate amount of time has been provided in each of the locations to avail the best of them. While on this tour, the cyclists will be staying at the best hotels in and around the destinations that will be covered. In a nutshell, this rural cycling tour has been designed to bring the cyclists, close to Rajasthan’s  country life and its rustic charm.
